name: Central Province
description: Like the name suggests, this is the central region of Calatia and home to the Calatian Royalty. The greatest city of the country is located in the Central Province: Meridia. Though Meridia is the largest city, the capital of the Central Province is in Chorus of Angels.  Warriors and adventurers from all over the country travel to the Knights Academy to become Sentinels or join the Calatian army.

areas.name: Chorus of Angels
areas.text: The capital of Calatia! This city was founded after the Great Disaster had destroyed much of the country to the north. The builders of the city claimed that their work was accompanied by the sound of singing, though the source of music could never be verified. The Queen's castle, Castle Calatia, is in the center of Chorus.

areas.name: Knights Academy
areas.text: This is where the Knights of Calatia train. The Knights make up a majority of the Calatian army. The rest are Marshals, Sentinels, and, recently, the Courageous.

areas.name: Queen's Gardens
areas.text: A private wooded area that only a select few may enter.

areas.name: Meridia
areas.text: Calatia's largest city, Meridia is located in the center of the country. The residents earn their money primarily through the mines in the Meridia Mountains.

areas.name: Fable Mountain
areas.text: This mountain was a legendary place to commune with the Caretaker, but it has been quiet for many years.

areas.name: Ironwood
areas.text: A strange forest known for its particularly resilient trees. Houses or items crafted with ironwood are extremely expensive.

areas.name: Highburn
areas.text: A fortress on the borders of the Outlands. Only those with a writ from the Queen may pass its walls.

areas.name: Meridia Mountains
areas.text: A series of mountains in Central Calatia, known for their vast mines and riches.
